official_title: Participatory Research to Advance Colon Cancer Prevention
inclusion_criteria:
* Persons aged 50-75 years and not up-to-date with colorectal cancer screening
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 75 Years
exclusion_criteria: * Persons having colorectal disease (e.g., ulcerative colitis or colectomy), personal history of colorectal cancer or colorectal disease, end-stage or life threatening diseases or, those known to be under hospice care or living in a skilled nursing facility may be excluded.
